page.title: Assurance of Salvation
page.verse: NKJV..And this is the testimony: that God has given us eternal life, and this life is in His Son. He who has the Son has life; he who does not have the Son of God does not have life.

page.title: Assurance of Answered Prayer
page.verse: Until now you have asked nothing in My name. Ask, and you will receive, that your joy may be full.

page.title: Assurance of Victory
page.verse: No temptation has overtaken you except such as is common to man; but God is faithful, who will not allow you to be tempted beyond what you are able, but with the temptation will also make the way of escape, that you may be able to bear it.

page.title: Assurance of Forgiveness
page.verse: If we confess our sins, He is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

page.title: Assurance of Guidance
page.verse: Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways acknowledge Him, and He shall direct your paths.

page.title: Christ the Center
page.verse: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation; old things have passed away; behold, all things have become new.

page.title: God's Word
page.verse: All Scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness.

page.title: Fellowship
page.verse: And let us consider one another in order to stir up love and good works, not forsaking the assembling of ourselves together, as is the manner of some, but exhorting one another, and so much the more as you see the Day approaching.

page.title: Obedience to Christ
page.verse: I beseech you therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God, that you present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable to God, which is your reasonable service.

page.title: Prayer
page.verse: If you abide in Me, and My words abide in you, you will ask what you desire, and it shall be done for you.

page.title: Witnessing
page.verse: Then he said to them, "Follow me, and I will make you fishers of men."

page.title: All Have Sinned
page.verse: For all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God.

page.title: Christ Paid the Penalty
page.verse: But God demonstrates His own love toward us, in that while we were still sinners, Christ died for us.

page.title: Must Receive Christ
page.verse: But as many as received Him, to them He gave the right to become children of God, to those who believe in His name.

page.title: Sin's Penalty
page.verse: For the wages of sin is death, but the gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.

page.title: Salvation Not By Works
page.verse: For by grace you have been saved through faith, and that not of yourselves; it is the gift of God, not of works, lest anyone should boast.

page.title: Assurance of Salvation
page.verse: These things I have written to you who believe in the name of the Son of God, that you may know that you have eternal life, and that you may continue to believe in the name of the Son of God.
